titles.title: Providing for the concurrence by the House with an amendment in the Senate amendment to H.R. 1651.

action.text: Mr. Gilchrest moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 579.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/18/2000--Introduced. Provides for concurrence by the House with an amendment in the Senate amendment to H.R. 1651 (commercial fishing vessels and Yukon River salmon).
